changelog.release_notes:
Quick fix a crash of 1.9. Previous version changes:

Optimized memory usage: gracefully handle most Out-of-Memory (OOM) conditions; decreased AppMessage buffer size. Should now work way better and stop crashing, especially on Aplite platform. Sometimes you will see <OOM> labels here and there; this means that you either have many tasklists or have many tasks / tasks with large notes in current list. Note that Time series watch have more memory available and will seldom suffer of this issue.

Optimized memory usage:
gracefully handle most Out-of-Memory (OOM) conditions;
decreased AppMessage buffer size.
Should now work way better and stop crashing, especially on Aplite platform.

Sometimes you will see <OOM> labels here and there; this means that you either have many tasklists or have many tasks / tasks with large notes in current list.
Note that Time series watch have more memory available and will seldom suffer of this issue.

Added option to change location of "Add task" command.
Added option to use larger fonts for tasks list.
Fixed statusbar display bug introduced in previous version.
Fixed bug causing big tasklists (over 100 tasks) to fail to load.

Added basic support for Pebble Round. Visuals may be not neat, but it should be useable.
Also added a "strike out" effect on colour Pebble watches (like the one which was used on b&w Pebbles).

Implemented new task adding with Dictation API which was added in 3.6 firmware.
Also fixed timezone glitch for Timeline pins.

1. Finally fixed bugs related to configuration saving/loading. Now all sorting options should work fine, even after app restart.

2. Implemented very basic timeline support. When you open certain tasklist, all tasks in it which have due date set will be added to your timeline. Note that if you add/change/delete due dates of your tasks, timeline pins will only be updated after you open corresponding tasklist in watch app. I hope to fix it later.

Implemented sorting tasks by due date.
There might be some bugs related to sorting, please feel free to report.
Fixed memory allocation bug which sometimes caused app to silently crash on 3.2 firmware
Fixed «black selected text on black selection» bug on PebbleTime

Should now work on Pebble Time.
Now done tasks are displayed in details in green color.

Implemented task sorting (by status, by date, alphabetic) - configured from phone.
Improved overall stability.
Fixed bug with some tasklists being not shown when there are many tasklists.
Fixed several minor bugs.
New in this version: show task details (including notes) on long Select press

data.description:
Browse all your ToDo lists (from GoogleTasks) right on your wrist! Task notes are supported too. You can also mark tasks as Done. You will no longer need to look at your phone while buying groceries in store or something else. This app uses task lists stored in Google Tasks service. You can manage them from the web browser on your PC or phone. Also you can use any GoogleTasks-compatible mobile ToDo/notes app.
Voice input is now supported as well! You can add tasks by dictation.
Previous names: PebbleNotes, PebbleTasks.
data.title: GoogleTasks for Pebble
